refuseWord: Your course did not pass the review for the following reasons
Please submit the revised curriculum. For questions about the review, please email to info@51jianjiao.com, stating the publishing account, specific courses and questions.
draft: Data detected in the draft box, read?
Click Cancel to clear the draft box.
warning: After submitting for review and passing it, the user can see the course on the platform.
Courses have been published. The page information needs to be submitted again after the modification, and the user cannot see the new information again before passing the review.
The course has been submitted for review. It is estimated that the review will be completed within 1-2 working days. Please be patient.
leaveTips: Information not saved, sure to leave?
